channel.title: Whisper gone Wrong
channel.description:
#### What happened? 9 whispered to himself, he whispered to prince but the display was wrong.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? It was supposed to show 9 whispered to 11 (prince)
#### Steps to reproduce: Whisper someone
#### Comments: I got proof an image!! Probs going to report 9 so the devs could see what happened in the game, but comment caught bug this is not a real report.
![Bugs|513x123](upload://ipLqr6h6hqiP93g2f3dAxqpQIc5.PNG)

item.title: Whisper gone Wrong
item.dc:creator: Sam17z
item.description:
What happened?

9 whispered to himself, he whispered to prince but the display was wrong.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

It was supposed to show 9 whispered to 11 (prince)

Steps to reproduce:

Whisper someone

Comments:

I got proof an image!! Probs going to report 9 so the devs could see what happened in the game, but comment caught bug this is not a real report.

Read full topic
